emails.subject: New Product Launch
emails.body:
Dear Ali,

We are excited to announce the launch of our new product line next month. I would like to set up a meeting to discuss how we can collaborate to promote these products within your market segment.

Best regards,
Product Team
Omantel

emails.subject: Re: New Product Launch
emails.body:
Dear Team,

Thank you for sharing this update. I am interested in discussing potential marketing strategies and how we can align this launch with our current initiatives. Please let me know a suitable time for a meeting.

Best,
Ali Aziz
Regional Manager
Ooredoo
